mxswa:ActivityReference.Arguments.InArgument: [New Object() { Microsoft.Xrm.Sdk.Workflow.WorkflowPropertyType.String, "Hi. Welcome to the City of Bellevue's customer support hotline.", "String" }]
[New Object() { Microsoft.Xrm.Sdk.Workflow.WorkflowPropertyType.String, "Please give me your first name.", "String" }]
[New Object() { Microsoft.Xrm.Sdk.Workflow.WorkflowPropertyType.String, "Please give me your last name.", "String" }]
[New Object() { Microsoft.Xrm.Sdk.Workflow.WorkflowPropertyType.String, "Enter last name in the text box.", "String" }]
[New Object() { Microsoft.Xrm.Sdk.Workflow.WorkflowPropertyType.String, "In case we get disconnected, we need your phone number to call you back. Can you please share your phone number?", "String" }]
[New Object() { Microsoft.Xrm.Sdk.Workflow.WorkflowPropertyType.String, "We use e-mail to communicate the case status and details, would you like to share your e-mail address?", "String" }]
[New Object() { Microsoft.Xrm.Sdk.Workflow.WorkflowPropertyType.String, "What are you calling with regard to?", "String" }]
[New Object() { Microsoft.Xrm.Sdk.Workflow.WorkflowPropertyType.String, "Select from one of the options.", "String" }]
